newsitem.title: POLAND: NBP BUYS DLRS AT PLN 2.9570, MARKS AT 1.8070.
newsitem.headline: NBP BUYS DLRS AT PLN 2.9570, MARKS AT 1.8070.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland (NBP) bought dollars on the interbank market at 2.9570 zlotys and marks at 1.8070 zlotys, dealers said.

The interventions, described as "large", came at around 1300 GMT when the zloty was at 3.21 percent for the dollar and 3.38 for the mark from the parity rates for today -- the centre of the daily 14-percent trading band.
The NBP last intervened on the market on Monday, pushing the zloty down to below three percent from parity rate at the expense of some $80 million.
